data.title: 快速开始
data.description: 了解如何快速上手 Flashduty

data.title: 常见问题
data.description: 了解使用 Flashduty 中最常见的问题

data.title: 产品对比
data.description: 对比 Flashduty 和 Pagerduty 的产品、服务和价格

data.title: 什么是故障
data.description: Flashduty 中的故障代表一个正在发生的问题或者一个需要处理的事项。故障一般由告警触发，常常关联了一些列相似的告警

data.title: 检索与查看故障
data.description: 了解故障列表、详情页的使用，包括聚合视图和筛选以及时间线

data.title: 处理与更新故障
data.description: 了解如何修改故障的标题等信息，以及如何处理故障

data.title: 升级与分派故障
data.description: 了解如何重新分派、升级分派，或者添加处理人

data.title: 自定义字段
data.description: 了解、配置和使用自定义字段

data.title: 自定义操作
data.description: 了解自定义操作的使用场景和配置方式

data.title: 了解告警降噪
data.description: 理解Flashduty如何针对告警进行降噪

data.title: 协作空间管理
data.description: 协作空间作为一个组织和管理故障排查的核心载体，旨在将不同团队、不同业务系统或不同服务模块的告警进行分别管理，每个协作空间通常对应于团队日常运营和维护的一个特定范围

data.title: 多种接入告警方式
data.description: 通过专属集成或共享集成接入告警，以及专属集成和共享集成两者的区别是什么

data.title: 配置告警降噪
data.description: 通过告警聚合，可以将多条相似的活跃告警聚合到同一条故障中，一起分派、通知和处理，这可以显著降低通知频次并提高处置效率

data.title: 配置分派策略
data.description: 通过分派策略可以将不同业务或不同团队的告警事件分派到相应的处理组，且能够通过不同渠道触达到相应的处理成员

data.title: 个人偏好设置
data.description: 可以为账号进行个性化配置、配置个人通知方式

data.title: 配置服务日历
data.description: 通过配置服务日历，可以使用工作日或休息日模式进行管理分配策略和静默规则

data.title: 配置通知模版
data.description: 通过自定义配置模版，可以实现个性化通知内容的需求

data.title: 配置值班规则
data.description: 通过配置值班规则，可以实现自动调度和通知到具体值班人

data.title: 配置标签增强
data.description: 标签的作用和如何配置标签增强

data.title: 团队和成员
data.description: 团队的操作和成员的管理

data.title: 权限、角色
data.description: 了解功能权限和数据权限的区别

data.title: 配置单点登录
data.description: 通过单点登录使您能够轻松地集成到各种不同的应用和平台中，实现登录一次，便可访问多个相关联的应用程序和服务

data.title: 引用变量
data.description: 通过修改推送参数，实现对故障的严重程度和标题等信息的定制

data.title: 动态设置分派人员
data.description: 实现告警基于标签动态进行分派，与您自研系统打通

data.title: 邮件Email集成
data.description: 在 Flashduty 生成唯一的邮件地址，通过邮件的方式将告警的发生与恢复同步到 Flashduty

data.title: 夜莺/FlahCat集成
data.description: 通过 webhook 的方式将夜莺（Nightingale / n9e）或 Flashcat 告警事件推送到 Flashduty。当告警触发时，向 Flashduty 发送触发事件，当告警恢复时，向 Flashduty 发送恢复事件

data.title: Prometheus告警集成
data.description: 通过 webhook 的方式将 Prometheus 告警事件通过 AlertManager 推送到 Flashduty。当告警触发时，向 Flashduty 发送触发事件，当告警恢复时，向 Flashduty 发送恢复事件

data.title: 自定义告警事件集成指引
data.description: 通过标准协议推送自有系统告警事件到 Flashduty，实现告警事件自动化降噪处理

data.title: 飞书 Lark集成
data.description: 通过集成飞书自建应用，实现在飞书端内接收和响应告警的能力

data.title: 钉钉集成
data.description: 通过集成钉钉自建应用，实现在钉钉端内接收和响应告警的能力

data.title: 企业微信集成
data.description: 通过集成企业微信第三方应用，实现在企业微信端内接收和响应告警的能力

data.title: Slack 集成
data.description: 通过集成Slack第三方应用，实现在Slack内接收和响应告警的能力

data.title: Microsoft Teams集成

data.title: Grafana集成
data.description: 通过 webhook 的方式同步 Grafana 告警事件到快猫星云，实现告警事件自动化降噪处理

data.title: Zabbix集成

data.title: 故障静默与抑制
data.description: FlashDuty提供了静默和抑制机制，来帮助企业优化告警流程，前者临时屏蔽特定条件下的告警通知

data.title: 配置告警降噪
data.description: 配置路由规则实现将相同类型或相关业务的告警事件分发到对应的协作空间中，实现信息分类处理、分析等

data.title: 配置过滤条件
data.description: Flashduty的分派策略、静默、抑制、路由、标签增强等功能中，大量使用条件匹配来过滤特定告警或故障，本文介绍如何配置这些条件

历史故障功能，正是为响应人员提供的一个已解决的相似的故障列表。对于不熟悉此问题的响应人员，可以快速查阅历史故障的时间线、根因和解决办法，并复制相关操作。历史故障提供了解决问题所需的上下文，也避免了响应人员遇到不熟悉问题时产生恐慌。
障被识别为新奇故障，那么故障响应者应该感到警惕。这对于 OnCall 工程师非常重要，因为新奇故障带来的影响可能是未知的，其处置步骤可能也需要临时决断。而有一些工程师，可能只关心那些新奇故障，他们会为解决此类故障制定标准化流程或者SOP。

data.title: Alert webhook
data.description: Configure alert webhooks to receive HTTP callbacks at your specified URL when alerts have specific actions (such as triggering or closing). The callback content includes the latest key information about the alert, allowing integration with your custom tools.

data.title: Incident webhook
data.description: Configure incident webhooks to receive HTTP callbacks at your specified URL when incidents have specific actions (such as triggering or closing). The callback content includes the latest key information about the incident, allowing integration with your custom tools.

data.title: Costom action
data.description: Custom incident actions allow you to quickly invoke external interfaces during incident troubleshooting for incident self-healing, information enrichment, and other custom operations.

data.description: Guide to configuring SSO login with Authing

data.description: Tutorial for configuring Single Sign-On in Keycloak

data.description: he Meilisearch documentation is open-source. Learn how to help make it even better

data.title: Dingtalk Integration
data.description: Integrate with Dingtalk custom application to receive and respond to alerts within Dingtalk

data.title: WeCom Integration
data.description: Integrate WeCom third-party application to receive and respond to alerts within WeCom

data.title: Slack Integration
data.description: Integrate with Slack to receive and respond to alerts within Slack

data.title: Microsoft Teams Integration
data.description: Integrate Microsoft Teams as a third-party application to receive and respond to alerts within Microsoft Teams

data.title: Standard Change Event
data.description: Push change events from your own systems to Flashduty using standard protocols. Most incidents are caused by changes, and the correlation between changes and alerts helps quickly identify incident causes.

data.title: Jira Issue Events
data.description: Sync Jira Issue events to Flashduty via webhooks to collect change events.

data.title: Channel
data.description: What is a channel, what features does it have, and how to manage it

data.description: How to configure escalation rules and what notification methods are available

data.description: Understanding label functions and configuring label enrichment

data.description: Examples of schedule rules and schedule configuration

data.title: Notification Templates
data.description: By customizing template configurations, you can meet the demand for personalized notification content.

data.title: Service Calendar
data.description: Configure Service Calendar

data.title: Personal Preferences
data.description: Account personalization and notification settings

data.title: Routing Rules
data.description: Configure routing rules to distribute alerts of the same type or related business to corresponding channels for classified processing and analysis

data.title: Silence and Inhibition
data.description: FlashDuty provides silence and inhibition mechanisms to help organizations optimize their alert processes. The former temporarily blocks alert notifications under specific conditions, while the latter automatically prevents duplicate or expected alerts under certain conditions, jointly reducing interference and improving alert system efficiency and accuracy

data.title: Filter Conditions
data.description: Flashduty uses condition matching extensively in escalation rules, silence rules, inhibit rules, routing, label enhancement, and other features to filter specific alerts or incidents. This article explains how to configure these conditions

data.title: Alert Noise Reduction
data.description: Through alert grouping, multiple similar active alerts can be grouped into a single incident for unified assignment, notification, and handling, significantly reducing notification frequency and improving response efficiency

data.title: Standard Alert Integration
data.description: Push alerts from your own system to Flashduty using standard protocols to achieve automated alert noise reduction.

data.title: Email Integration
data.description: Generate a unique email address in Flashduty to synchronize alert triggers and recoveries through email

data.title: Nightingale/FlashCat Integration
data.description: Push alert events from Nightingale (n9e) or Flashcat to Flashduty via webhook. When an alert is triggered, send a trigger event to Flashduty; when an alert recovers, send a recovery event to Flashduty

data.title: Prometheus Integration Guide
data.description: Push Prometheus alert events to Flashduty through AlertManager using webhooks. When an alert is triggered, it sends a trigger event to Flashduty, and when the alert recovers, it sends a recovery event.

data.description: Sync Grafana alert events to Flashduty via webhook to achieve automated alert noise reduction.

data.title: 告警 webhook
data.description: 配置告警 Webhook，当告警发生特定操作（如触发、关闭）时，系统通过 HTTP 回调您配置的地址。回调内容将包含告警最新关键信息，您可以与自研工具进行集成。

data.title: 故障 webhook
data.description: 配置故障 Webhook，当故障发生特定操作（如触发、关闭）时，系统通过 HTTP 回调您配置的地址。回调内容将包含故障最新关键信息，您可以与自研工具进行集成。
配置故障 自定义操作，允许您在故障排查期间，快速调用外部接口，实现故障自愈、信息丰富等任何自定义操作。

data.title: 告警处理 pipeline
data.description: 告警处理 Pipeline 用于对触发的告警事件进行管理和优化，包括更新告警标题、修改告警描述、调整告警严重程度、以及执行告警过滤或抑制等操作。通过合理配置告警处理规则，可以提升告警的可读性、减少告警噪声，并提升定位问题的效率。

data.title: Alert Pipeline
data.description: The Alert Pipeline is used to manage and optimize triggered alert events, including updating alert titles, modifying alert descriptions, adjusting alert severity, and performing alert filtering or inhibition operations. Through proper configuration of alert rules, you can improve alert readability, reduce alert noise, and enhance problem identification efficiency.

data.title: 分析数据
data.description: 通过分析数据看板进行数据分析时，可以基于协作空间、团队、人员等多种维度统计和分析故障的数据，并且支持下载和导出数据，实现以数据驱动业务增长。

data.title: Jira 事件集成指引
data.description: 通过 webhook 的方式同步 Jira Issue 事件到 Flashduty，实现变更事件收集。

data.title: 自定义变更事件集成指引
data.description: 通过标准协议推送自有系统变更事件到 Flashduty，大部分故障由变更导致，变更和告警事件联动有助于快速定位故障原因。

data.title: Prometheus 告警规则配置说明
data.description: description: "本文档详细介绍如何在 Monitors 告警引擎中配置 Prometheus 数据源的告警规则。Monitors 兼容 Prometheus 的 PromQL 查询语法

data.title: ElasticSearch 告警规则配置说明
data.description: 本文档详细介绍如何在 Monitors 告警引擎中配置 ElasticSearch 数据源的告警规则。Monitors 通过 ElasticSearch SQL 功能实现对日志和指标数据的监控，支持灵活的聚合查询与告警判定。

data.title: ClickHouse 告警规则配置说明

data.title: Oracle 告警规则配置说明
data.description: 本文档详细介绍如何在 Monitors 告警引擎中配置 Oracle 数据源的告警规则。Monitors 支持使用标准 SQL 语法对 Oracle 进行查询，并根据查询结果触发告警。

data.title: PostgreSQL 告警规则配置说明
data.description: 本文档详细介绍如何在 Monitors 告警引擎中配置 PostgreSQL 数据源的告警规则。Monitors 支持使用标准 SQL 语法对 PostgreSQL 进行查询，并根据查询结果触发告警。

data.title: SLS (Aliyun Log Service) 告警规则配置说明
data.description: 本文档详细介绍如何在 Monitors 告警引擎中配置阿里云日志服务 (SLS) 数据源的告警规则。Monitors 支持使用标准 SQL 语法对 SLS 进行查询，并根据查询结果触发告警。

data.title: Prometheus Alert Rule Configuration
data.description: This document provides detailed instructions on configuring alert rules for Prometheus data sources in Monitors. Monitors is compatible with Prometheus PromQL query syntax and offers flexible alert evaluation and recovery mechanisms to meet various monitoring requirements.

data.title: ElasticSearch Alert Rule Configuratio
data.description: This document provides detailed instructions on configuring alert rules for ElasticSearch data sources in Monitors. Monitors uses ElasticSearch SQL functionality to monitor log and metric data, supporting flexible aggregation queries and alert evaluation.

data.title: Loki Alert Rule Configuration
data.description: This document provides detailed instructions on configuring alert rules for Loki data sources in Monitors. Monitors supports Loki's LogQL query syntax and can perform aggregation analysis on log data to trigger alerts.

data.title: ClickHouse Alert Rule Configuration
data.description: This document provides detailed instructions on configuring alert rules for ClickHouse data sources in Monitors. Monitors supports using standard SQL syntax to query ClickHouse and trigger alerts based on query results.

data.title: MySQL Alert Rule Configuration
data.description: This document provides detailed instructions on configuring alert rules for MySQL data sources in Monitors. Monitors supports using standard SQL syntax to query MySQL and trigger alerts based on query results.

data.title: Oracle Alert Rule Configuration
data.description: This document provides detailed instructions on configuring alert rules for Oracle data sources in Monitors. Monitors supports using standard SQL syntax to query Oracle and trigger alerts based on query results.

data.title: PostgreSQL Alert Rule Configuration
data.description: This document provides detailed instructions on configuring alert rules for PostgreSQL data sources in Monitors. Monitors supports using standard SQL syntax to query PostgreSQL and trigger alerts based on query results.

data.title: SLS (Alibaba Cloud Log Service) Alert Rule Configuration
data.description: This document provides detailed instructions on configuring alert rules for Alibaba Cloud Log Service (SLS) data sources in Monitors. Monitors supports using standard SQL syntax to query SLS and trigger alerts based on query results.

data.title: VictoriaLogs 告警规则配置说明
data.description: 本文档介绍如何在 Monitors 告警引擎中配置 VictoriaLogs 数据源的告警规则。

data.title: VictoriaLogs Alert Rule Configuration
data.description: This document describes how to configure VictoriaLogs data source alert rules in the Monitors alert engine.

data.title: Loki 告警规则配置说明
data.description: 本文档详细介绍如何在 Monitors 告警引擎中配置 Loki 数据源的告警规则。Monitors 支持 Loki 的 LogQL 查询语法，能够对日志数据进行聚合分析并触发告警。
